description: Retrieves a list of existing quotes limited to a specific range of days.

queryParameters.name: user_id
queryParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

queryParameters.name: quote_id
queryParameters.description: Unique identifier of the quote generated by Parfin.

queryParameters.name: external_id
queryParameters.description: Specifies the external ID of the quote.

queryParameters.name: currency_pair
queryParameters.description: Specifies the currency pair relevant to the current quote, formatted as "BaseCurrency/QuoteCurrency" (e.g., "BTC/BRL").

queryParameters.name: side
queryParameters.description: Specifies the side of the quote, whether it is buy or sell.

queryParameters.name: status_quote
queryParameters.description: Specifies the status of the quote.

queryParameters.name: page_number
queryParameters.description: Specifies the page number from which the request will start.

queryParameters.name: page_size
queryParameters.description: Specifies the number of items displayed per page in the paginated result.

queryParameters.name: date_from
queryParameters.description: Formats Accepts: ["YYYY-MM-DD", "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS"], The maximum interval is 30 days, depending on the date_to value.

description: Provides a transparent breakdown of how each quote is derived, showcasing the various components that contribute to the final price.

pathParameters.name: quote_id
pathParameters.description: Unique identifier of the quote generated by Parfin.

description: Cancels an existing quote by providing quote_id and user_id.

pathParameters.name: user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

pathParameters.name: quote_id
pathParameters.description: Unique identifier of the quote generated by Parfin.

description: Accept a quote that has been previously generated.

pathParameters.name: user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

pathParameters.name: quote_id
pathParameters.description: Unique identifier of the quote generated by Parfin.

description: Initiates a Request for Quote (RFQ) for either buying or selling a digital asset. The RFQ is per end-user and you can specify the input in two different ways: using 'input_type' OR 'amount_type' (mutually exclusive - use one or the other, not both).

pathParameters.name: user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

description: Retrieves an existing quote by providing quote_id and user_id.

pathParameters.name: user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

pathParameters.name: quote_id
pathParameters.description: Unique identifier of the quote generated by Parfin.
